title: Account Banned for a stupid reason
body:
I recently had my credentials stolen i have contacted Riot and recovered my account the account was sold by that someone who stole my credentials and so on the game continued i don't know what and where everything happened to my account but i have provided proof that this wasn't me i still haven't gotten a response from riot but after looking in forums about people getting perma bans its unlikely that my account will be lifted from suspension 
i have told Riot everything they need to know this account has been with me 5 years now exclude a few month due to the case ( Where they stole and used my account as a Bidding  item for sale ) i have proof such as all the purchases i have made on this account for example  .. Credit card logs , PayPal .. Etc. 
My question is .. Does anyone know will in my case this permanent ban on my account ever be lifted?

replies.body: it really sucks that your account was compromised, but due to the selling of the account the suspension won't be lifted. We take this sort of thing very seriously and the specialist has the final say in the matter.

May i ask did you come to a final decision because it's not fair i had exams i study in a university i couldnt play i had no time , I like playing league it helps me in many ways do keep in mind i did not have anything to do with this how is it that im the one being punished here ?

Thank you in advance.
